item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 31, 2024 at 1:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. U.S. Army Soldier Arrested in AT&T, Verizon Extortions (126 points | 53 comments)

23. Beyond Gradient Averaging in Parallel Optimization (84 points | 26 comments)

26. Behind the Scenes: Alien Worlds – Jumpship over a tidally locked planet (59 points | 3 comments)
27. Tell HN: John Friel my father, internet pioneer and creator of QModem, has died (967 points | 80 comments)
28. Pee.ie – Public Toilets Near Me Ireland (41 points | 18 comments)
29. The Homa Network Protocol (99 points | 14 comments)
30. Orbit by Mozilla (276 points | 264 comments)
